overview: Some women have too much erotic energy! Torrid Tami Monroe is such a woman. As a wild rock n' roll groupie, Tami and her swinging friends take on all comers! And is it juicy! From sizzling solo action to girl/girl to throbbing lust-music with the boys in the band, no one misses a beat! But there's one man who has what it takes for The Taming of Tami. When they get down and dirty, he's going to have Miss Monroe purring like a kitten.
title: The Taming of Tami
